snippet: Twelve in 12, part of Trinity Wall Street’s long-running series of free, hourlong programs at 1 p.m., offers works by the 12 recent winners of the Pulitzer Prize for music.
abstract: James R Oestreich reviews performance by the Novus NY instrumental ensemble at Trinity Wall Street.
lead_paragraph: Twelve in 12, part of Trinity Wall Street’s long-running series of free, hourlong programs at 1 p.m., offers works by the 12 recent winners of the Pulitzer Prize for music.

headline.seo: Twelve in 12, Trinity Wall Street’s Concerts at One
